clinical_study.brief_title: A Study Of Riluzole In Patients With Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
clinical_study.official_title: Structural and Spectroscopy Pharmaco-Imaging Paradigm to Investigate the Effect of Riluzole in Patients With Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)

brief_summary.textblock: This randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel group study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of riluzole in patients with PTSD. Patients will be randomized to receive either riluzole 50mg twice per day or placebo orally for 8 weeks as outpatient, with a 4-week open-label period.
